articles.title: Proton transport through nanoscale corrugations in two-dimensional crystals - Nature.com
articles.description: A study using high-resolution scanning electrochemical cell microscopy attributes proton permeation through defect-free graphene and hexagonal boron nitride to transport across areas of the structure that are under strain.
